title: Demarcus Ware Joins the Show!
description:
DeMarcus Ware joins Jalen & Jacoby to talk this year’s draft. Find out his advice for the Dallas Cowboys and for the rookies entering the league. Plus, Ja Morant has the dunk of a lifetime AND hits the game-winner. Jalen & Jacoby discuss Ja’s ascendence into stardom. Does Jalen regret saying Ja wasn’t deserving of the Most Improved Player Award? And the Miami Heat knock out the Atlanta Hawks even without Jimmy Butler and Kyle Lowry. Defense locked down Trae once again and Victor Oladipo led the way. Find out what’s next for this Miami Heat squad. Plus, Odell Beckham puts his mansion up for sale. Does anyone really need a shoe store in the basement? All this and more.
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
